summary: Test suite that verifies the AudioLDMPipeline's end‑to‑end behavior, covering component integration, input validation, attention and sampling mechanisms, prompt and embedding handling, vocoder output dimensions, and consistency of batch inference across fast, nightly, and slow test categories.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and quality of the audio generation pipeline before deployment, ensuring that all functional aspects work correctly under various test regimes to maintain product stability and user satisfaction.
